newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cenbank sets new weaker reais trade level.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cenbank sets new weaker reais trade level.

text.p: Brazil's Central Bank signalled a new weaker trading level for the real currency by buying dollars at 1.0460 reais and selling dollars at 1.0510 reais in the buy/sell tender in the commercial foreign exchange market, dealers said.
Under the previous mini-band set on Friday, the real was traded between 1.0450 and 1.0500 reais to the dollar.
